description: ParaDrop host configuration - Wi-Fi interface section

device.description: Physical device used by this interface, must match a device id in the wifi section.

encryption.description: Type of wireless network security to use, e.g. none, psk2, wpa2 (Enterprise).

network.description: Network name the interface should be attached to, typically lan for ap mode interfaces.

ssid.description: ESSID for ap and managed mode interfaces.
